column1: Gléowine was a Minstrels of the Kings of Rohan of Rohan in the late Third Age.
Gléowine composed an immortalizing song about Théoden and his ancestors after the Battle of the Pelennor Fields. It was said that he never composed another song afterwards. Sadly
he rode singing in the sun
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Gléowine is a major character in the Lord of the Rings Online. He was Horn (Man of Rohan)s mentor. He is first encountered being banished from Edoras at the command of Gríma
column2: and later accompanies the player and his old apprentice on their journeys in the Riddermark.
